definition: Mr Wang from next door (term used jocularly to refer to a neighbor who is supposedly sleeping with one's wife)
to separate/to partition/to stand or lie between/at a distance from/after or at an interval of

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
daughter-in-law/wife (of a younger man)/young married woman/young woman
household/dwelling/family/sb else's house/household business/house of woman's husband-to-be/CL:戶|户[hu4],家[jia1]
other people/sb else/he, she or they/I, me (referring to oneself as "one" or "people")
